name: Post-haste
description:
TAKES ABOUT 10 SECONDS TO LOAD BUT IT DOES WORK! :P

-- Now working in browser, but the graphics aren't quite as good as in the download --

The Island of Gwenderbel has long smugly held the Island Award for the most reliable postage. But last night, a once-in-a-millenia storm has ravaged our coastline, blocking the coastal road we rely upon to deliver our mail! Our esteemed postal service cannot be hampered by this; we will literally sacrifice anything to save our cherished "Perfect Postage Punctuality" Award. The residents stand ready to take heavy casualties!

'Post-haste' is a driving puzzle game where you must you must maneuver and crash the cars at your disposal so that the postal van can reach all of the checkpoints.

You must get the postage van (which is red) to each checkpoint within the number of moves listed on the bottom of the screen.

Controls:

(all controls are from the perspective of the car you have selected)

"up-arrow"  -  move selected car forward one block

"left/right-arrow"  -  rotate selected car 90' left/right and move forward one block

"mouse-click + drag"  -  rotate camera

"mouse-wheel"  -  zoom

"Esc"  -  reset level

Assets:

All assets were made from scratch by Tom & Sam for the Wowie Jam
